level.heading: Approval for discontinuance or settlement.
level.text: A derivative action to enforce a right of a limited cooperative association shall not be discontinued or settled without the Superior Court's approval.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 1304 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act.
